post.summary: Create new AccessToken with associated data
This operation  is used to cancel existing AutoPay Enrollment.
This operation returns the result of checking the use of the payment method for AutoPay.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Data to check payment method using

post.summary: This operation is used to create a new AutoPay Enrollment.
This operation returns an active AutoPay Enrollments for provided policies.

This operation is used to modify an existing AutoPay Enrollment.
This method is used to change an existing installment plan.
If InstallmentEngine is Carrier-controlled (i.e. carrier provides control of Installment Plans by ExternalAPI),
the Installment Plan will be updated by Carrier, and installment plan information will be recieved from Carrier side.
If InstallmentEngine is contolled by OneInc, Installment Plan will be changed and installment plan information will be recieved.

This operation is used to charge existing AutoPay Enrollment.
It is used to make a payment for a particular policy with an existing AutoPay installment plan.
When payment has been processed a postback about result and payment information will be sent to Carrier.

This operation tokenizes all the required information for Apple Pay payment.
Once the information is tokenized, you no longer have to provide us any sensitive information
to make payments to this card. To initiate transactions with a token simply provide the token
that is returned in the SaveMobile results in the ProcessOne RESTful API.
Note: the first payment must be made with the token within 30 minutes of the SaveMobile request.

This operation allows making a payment using the Apple Pay as a provider,
 which initiates a transfer of money from a particular customer account to the merchant account.
You have to provide a valid payment token in your request.

This operation tokenizes all the required information about a credit card payment method.
Once the card information is tokenized, you no longer have to provide us any sensitive credit card information.
To initiate transactions with a tokenized card simply provide the token that is returned by our API.
This operation returns available card types.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Data for getting accepted card types

post.summary: This operation returns card information.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Data for getting credit card information

post.summary:
This operation creates a record for a new customer entity, generates and returns an unique identifier for it.
The method also creates a record in the Wallet table for the customer.

This operation tokenizes all the required information about a bank account payment method.
Once the bank account information has been tokenized, you no longer have to provide us any sensitive and personal information
to debit or credit a bank account, just use the token that is retunred by our API.
This operation returns saved payment methods.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Data for getting saved payment methods

post.summary: This operation returns default payment method.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Data for getting default payment method

post.summary: This operation sets the default payment method.
This operation removes payment method.

get.summary: This operation returns payment receipt as pdf file.

parameters.name: toPreview
parameters.description: Optional: Indicates that receipt file can be opened in a browser preview

post.summary: This operation returns payment receipts as merged pdf file.
This operation generates a payment receipt and sends it
This operation generates a payment receipts and sends it
This operation sends a text message with a payment receipt.
This operation sends a text message with a payment receipts.
This operation is used to cancel existing ScheduledPayment.

get.summary:
This operation is used to initiate the API session, and creates the PortalOneSessionKey.
Once the PortalOneSessionKey is created, you can use it to access other PortalOne API operations.

parameters.name: targetOperation
parameters.description: Target operation for which the session is created

parameters.name: isPortalTestPreviewMode
parameters.description: Flag indicates if portal will be opened in Test/Preview mode

post.summary: This method is used to contact Apple Pay server to open and validate Apple Pay payment session

This operation is used to initiate a temporary API session for authentication purposes and creates the PortalOneSessionKey.
Once the PortalOneSessionKey is created, you can use it to access PortalOne API operations related to authentication.

AutoPayEnrollmentIds.description: Collection of AutoPay Enrollment Ids which should be cancelled

ExtendedParameters.description: The collection of key value pairs for optional parameters

CheckPaymentMethodAutoPayStatusRequest.description: Check Payment Method AutoPay status operation request

CheckPaymentMethodAutoPayStatusResponse.description: Check Payment Method AutoPay Status Response

WithdrawalFrequency.description: Specifies how often payments should be made. Options: monthly, quarterly, semiannually, annually

AutoPayEngineType.description: This field will define who will control the AutoPay Payment Plan generation and recurring scheduling - whether it is Carrier Controlled or InstallmentsEngine controlled.

ChargeFee.description: Should we charge with fee (default - true)

ConvenienceFeeType.description: Provides the Type of Convenience Service Fee. (Default, Waive Fee, New Business, etc.)

Email.description: Customer email address(es). Send multiple addresses as semicolon delimited values.

NumberOfInstallments.description: Number of installment payments to be made

PaymentMethodDetails.description: Details that will be used to define the payment method for AutoPay.

WithdrawalDay.description: Specifies day of month when payments should be made. Either WithdrawalDay or EffectiveDate should be specified.

EffectiveDate.description: The date on which the first installment plan payment will be made. Must be at least plus one day from the current date. Either WithdrawalDay or EffectiveDate should be specified.

ExternalSchedulerEndpoint.description:
This field value should only be sent when autoPayEngineType = "Carrier".
Digital Payments will then use this endpoint to eventually send user-selected Payment Preferences for Auto-Pay Plan creation and scheduling.

SuppressPlanChangedSignalIOnEnrollment.description: Suppresses SignalInstallmentPlanChanged sending on Enrollment when the flag value is true.

ExtendedParameters.description: The collection of key value pairs for optional customer parameters

Token.description: Saved payment method token that will be used for the remaining installment payments.

CardDetails.description: Card details that will be used for the remaining installment payments.

EftDetails.description: Eft details  that will be used for the remaining installment payments.

TokenReusability.description: Ability to reuse token for all merchants

RoutingNumber.description: The bank routing number. Must contain numbers or hyphens.

AccountNumber.description: Account number. Must contain only numbers.

AccountGroupCode.description: This field is used to route money to different accounts based on a predefined groups.

Token.description: Saved payment method token that is used for the remaining installment payments.

Amount.description: The total amount that will be collected.

RemainingAmount.description: The remaining amount is to be collected.

EnrollmentDate.description: The date on which the first installment plan payment will be made.

Token.description: Saved payment method token that is used for the remaining installment payments.

WithdrawalDay.description: Specifies day of month when payments should be made

ExternalSchedulerEndpoint.description:
This field value should only be sent when autoPayEngineType = "Carrier".
Digital Payments will then use this endpoint to eventually send user-selected Payment Preferences for Auto-Pay Plan creation and scheduling.

NumberOfInstallments.description: Number of installment payments to be made

ChargeFee.description: Indicates if the payments will are/were processed with or without a fee

ConvenienceFeeType.description: Customizable convenience fee type that is matched with different types of transactions

ModifyAutoPayRequest.description: Request for modifying Installment Plan parameters.

PortalOneAuthenticationKey.description: Unique Identifier for the modal template.

PolicyRefNumber.description: Used to pass policy number or quote number for reference. This value is searchable and displayed in the Transaction search.

ChargeFee.description: Indicates if the payment will be/was processed with or without a fee

ConvenienceFeeType.description: Customizable convenience fee type that is matched with different types of transactions

WithdrawalDay.description: Specifies day of month when payments should be made

PortalOneAuthenticationKey.description: Unique Identifier for the modal template.

PolicyRefNumber.description: Used to pass policy number or quote number for reference. This value is also referred to as ClientReferenceData1 field in ExtendedParameters dictionary. This value is searchable and displayed in the Transaction search.

AccountGroupCode.description: Indicates the account group/corresponding bank account where the transaction's funds will be allocated from the set of account groups configured in your merchant settings. If omitted, the default account group configured in your merchant settings will be used.

ExtendedParameters.description: The collection of key value pairs for optional customer parameters

AuthCode.description: Authorization code sent from Bank. Can be used for reference.

BatchNumber.description: The batch number to which the ProcessOne transaction was attached.

CustomerName.description: Name that was provided with a card or bank account information. Passed back as Customer Name.

OutboundApiKey.description: Unique Identifier for the outbound API.

PaymentAmount.description: The premium payment amount excluding any convenience fees.

ConvenienceFee.description: The convenience fee applied to payment amount.

TokenId.description: Payment method TokenId that will be used for the payments.

AccountGroupCode.description: Indicates the account group/corresponding bank account where the transaction's funds will be allocated from the set of account groups configured in your merchant settings. If omitted, the default account group configured in your merchant settings will be used.

ExtendedParameters.description: The collection of key value pairs for optional customer parameters

ClientName.description: Used to pass name of the client.

ClientPhoneNumber.description: Used to pass phone number of the client.

ClientReferenceData1.description: Used to pass a reference number such as Policy, Quote, or Claim Number.

CustomerName.description: Used to pass customer name (insured name).

Type.description: Name of the Payment Method Details Type

ExtendedParameters.description: The collection of key value pairs for optional customer parameters

MobilePaymentToken.description: Payment data object provided by Apple API.

CallbackId.description: A callback id associated to save mobile transaction

DisplayName.description:
Optional: Display Name value for card, usually containing last 4 numbers.
Acquired from Apple Pay PKPaymentToken object

ClientReferenceData1.description: Used to pass a reference number such as Policy, Quote, or Claim Number. The value will be searchable in the transaction search report.

ClientReferenceData2.description: Used to pass and External TransactionId value. The value will be searchable in the transaction search report.

ClientReferenceData3.description: Used to pass location data such as the office the transaction originated. The value will be searchable in the transaction search report.

ClientReferenceData4.description: Used to pass additional information with the transaction. The value will be displayed in the transaction details.

ClientReferenceData5.description:
Used to pass additional reference source account data such as an account number for a multi-policy account.
The value will be searchable in the transaction search report.

MobilePaymentToken.description: Payment data object provided by Apple API.

CallbackId.description: A callback id associated to charge mobile transaction

DisplayName.description: Optional: Display Name value for card, usually containing last 4 numbers

ChargeFee.description: Should we charge with fee (default - true)

PaymentAmountGroupKey.description: An unique key of the amount group

UserSelectedAmount.description: Amount selected by a customer via UI.

DisplayName.description: A caption that should be displayed on UI

AccountGroupCode.description:
This field is used to route money to different accounts based
on a predefined groups. If this option is used a mapping must be setup
in ProcessOne before this value can be used.
This field is used to route money to different accounts based on a predefined group. If this option is used a mapping must be set up in ProcessOne before this value can be used.

AccountGroupProtected.description: Is used when a single transaction with multiple line items will have funds moved into 2 accounts. With any subsequent fund movement that happens after the original fund movement to the transaction, the Boolean refers to protecting one account over another. If omitted any subsequent fund movement will be applied at the same ratio as the original transaction.

IsPrepaidCard.description: Flag that shows whether this card is prepaid or not

ExternalCustomerId.description: An unique identifier of a customer in some external system. You can use ExternalCompanyContactId or ExternalIndividualId fields from the response by the ClaimsPay Api Account/GetInfo method.

PortalOneSessionKey.description: Session key. Either Session key or Authentication key parameter is required

PortalOneAuthenticationKey.description: Authentication key. Either Session key or Authentication key parameter is required

DateAdded.description: Date when payment method was added

IsPrepaidCard.description: Flag that show whether the card is prepaid or not

SetAsDefaultPaymentMethodRequest.description: Set default payment method operation request

PortalOneSessionKey.description: Session key. Either Session key or Authentication key parameter is required

PortalOneAuthenticationKey.description: Authentication key. Either Session key or Authentication key parameter is required

TimeZone.description: Short time zone name with daylight saving time suffix

ToPreview.description: Optional: Indicates that receipt file can be opened in a browser preview
Optional: Indicates that receipt file can be opened in a browser preview

ExtendedParameters.description: The collection of key value pairs for optional parameters
The collection of key value pairs for optional parameters

PublicId.description: PublicId to process scheduled payment for

TargetOperation.description: Target operation for which the session is created

IsPortalTestPreviewMode.description: Flag indicates if portal will be opened in Test/Preview mode

DisplayName.description: Name for displaying on the ApplePay payment sheet

PaymentSession.description: Object returned from Apple Pay server which is used to open the session

PolicyRefNumber.description: Policy number reference to cancel scheduled payment for

GeneratePdfRequest.description: Generate PDF document based on the text provided

Text.description: Text (html) to generate PDF body from

GetAccessTokenRequest.description: Request for retrieving data by AccessToken

AcknowledgmentRequired.description: Indicates that successful payment must be acknowledged by a customer service

ExtendedParameters.description: The collection of key value pairs for optional parameters

SelectedPaymentAmountGroups.description: Optional collection contains amounts for each amount group selected via UI.

AccountGroupProtectionSettings.description: Is used only when the client requires one account to be protected with any subsequent fund movement that happens after the original fund movement to the transaction.

ConvenienceFeeType.description: Customizable convenience fee type that is matched with different types of transactions

PolicyDetailsBase.description: Base class for the different Types of Policies

Type.description: Name of the Policy Details Type, like "Auto", "Home", "Other", "WorkersComp"

AcknowledgmentDelivered.description: Indicates that successful payment has been acknowledged by a customer service

ClientReferenceData1.description: Reference number such as Policy, Quote, or Claim Number for which payment is made.

TokenCreationTime.description: Token creation date and time in merchant time zone

TimeZone.description: Short time zone name with daylight saving time suffix

CallbackId.description: A callback id associated to save transaction

ExtendedParameters.description: The collection of key value pairs for optional parameters

PortalOneSessionKey.description: Session key. Either Session key or Authentication key parameter is required

PortalOneAuthenticationKey.description: Authentication key. Either Session key or Authentication key parameter is required
